thread.title: BRIEF-TSMC Says Estimated Investment In 5-Nanometer Technology At About T$700 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TSMC Says Estimated Investment In 5-Nanometer Technology At About T$700 Bln

organizations.name: reuters) - taiwan semiconductor manufacturing co ltd

text:
Jan 26 (Reuters) - Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co Ltd :
* SAYS ESTIMATED INVESTMENT IN 5-NANOMETER TECHNOLOGY IS APPROXIMATELY T$700 BILLION ($24.04 billion)
* SAYS TOTAL INVESTMENT IN FAB 18 WILL EXCEED T$500 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 29.1170 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
